meanings.definition: Youz (pronoun): Used to refer to the person or people being addressed.
meanings.sent1: Hey, youz over there, come here!
meanings.sent2: Can youz please pass me the salt?
meanings.sent3: The party was full of youz, all having a great time.

meanings.definition: Youz (noun): A group of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The youz gathered for a picnic in the park.
